Students can expect to learn through in-class lectures and discussions, however if COVID conditions worsen, the university might require us to conduct classes online. Through group and pair-work, students should plan on doing projects and presentations.

This is an all-English classroom. You greatly enhance your acquisition of English by using it as much as possible. In addition, using Japanese limits your classmates’ learning opportunities. Please encourage each other to use English. You could lose participation points if you use Japanese in class or outside of class in online situations.
